1. Welcome to zMantra

zMantra is an accessible and inclusive math learning game designed for all learners, especially those with visual impairments. Learn and play using modes that suit your style – touch, shake, draw, or explore with hints and feedback!

2. Accessibility and Interaction

We designed zMantra to be screen reader-friendly, gesture-aware, and customizable. Whether you\'re using TalkBack or interacting through gestures, the app adapts to your needs.

3. Main Menu

The main menu offers quick access to:

  • Quick Play – Jump into a random challenge
  • Learning Mode – Choose topics and go at your pace
  • Game Mode – Compete and test your skills
  • Settings – Customize accessibility, language, and difficulty

4. Quick Play

This mode gives you a random math activity based on your selected difficulty. Great for short, spontaneous practice!

5. Learning Mode

Choose what you want to learn. Each topic includes hints, repetition, and gentle guidance. No pressure, just progress.

6. Game Mode

Challenge yourself with timed questions and limited attempts. Perfect your skills and unlock rewards as you go!

7. Settings

In the settings screen, you can:

  • Change difficulty level
  • Switch interaction modes (touch, shake, draw, etc.)
  • Enable or disable audio hints
  • Change language or voice feedback options

8. Feedback and Community

We welcome your feedback! Join our community to share suggestions, report issues, or just say hi.
